citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 AM on
12/10/2015.
The licensee's animals, & living quarters are not on the premises. The most current itinerary only has the licensee
in travel status until November 30, 2015. If you are still in travel status, please send the Raleigh Regional Office
your update travel itinerary.
